a "sun.com.jdi.InvocationException" in the details area. This only happens 
with the IBM VM, and not for all arrays. Debugging shows that an NPE is being 
encountered when computing the toString(), which is done as an implicit 
evaluation of "Arrays.asList(array).toString()". Here's the NPE from the 
evaluation:
